quotes.text: It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to your enemies, but a great deal more to stand up to your friends.
quotes.author: Dumbledore

quotes.text: Do, or do not. There is no try.
quotes.author: Yoda

quotes.text: I know I have a heart because I feel it breaking.
quotes.author: Wizard of Oz

quotes.text: The appropriate question is when the hell are they?!
quotes.author: Dr. Emmet L. Brown

quotes.text: Who gives a fu**. Just be ready.
quotes.author: John McClane

quotes.text: May I ask, why you felt little Tiffany deserved to die?
quotes.author: Zed

quotes.text: Dave, my mind is going. I can feel it.
quotes.author: HAL 9000
